Hi Ian,

No problem, it was probably a good idea to explain to NEAT users 
=
anyway the reason for and circumstances of the rtNEAT patent.  I'm 
glad yo=
u gave me the opportunity.  Although, I'll still take you up 
on a slice of=
 pizza!
